answers.answer: Lol mine tasted like flat orange soda  good luck cuz that 3 hour one is a pain if u fail the 1hour one
When i took mine it tasted like gatoraid with tons of sugar yuck i felt like puking but i managed to keep it down good luck:)
I didn't think it was that bad. I had the orange and mine was just yesterday. It tasted like flat orange soda. But made my little man super active. Lol
It has made mine sleepy. He was really active before i drank it and now he isn't as active. Weird.
I.had the 2hr test Ewww i hate it so much.
So far Im only at the one hour. Hopefully i don't fail. Most of  the time my blood sugar runs around 65. So the drink has prolly put mw in the normal range.

question: Waiting for my gestational diabetes test to be over. Drank the nasty drink and now waiting.to get my blood drawn. It tasted like flat sprite. How gross!?
title: yuck!
